Description: Book of the Dead of Hortefnakht; sheet 2; row of black line vignettes at top; Hieratic text below in six columns.
Curator's comments: Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (87)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57252) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57252)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss, fractured Black ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (warped, cracked) Sandwich: board Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete - lower edge damaged
